name: contentful_search_entries
description: Search for entries using query parameters. Returns a maximum of 3 items per request. Use skip parameter to paginate through results.

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return (max: 3)

skip.description: Number of items to skip for pagination

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_create_entry
description: Create a new entry in Contentful. Before executing this function, you need to know the contentTypeId (not the content type NAME) and the fields of that contentType. You can get the fields definition by using the GET_CONTENT_TYPE tool. IMPORTANT: All field values MUST include a locale key (e.g., 'en-US') for each value, like: { title: { 'en-US': 'My Title' } }. Every field in Contentful requires a locale even for single-language content.

contentTypeId.description: The ID of the content type for the new entry

fields.description: The fields of the entry with localized values. Example: { title: { 'en-US': 'My Title' }, description: { 'en-US': 'My Description' } }

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_update_entry
description: Update an existing entry. The handler will merge your field updates with the existing entry fields, so you only need to provide the fields and locales you want to change. IMPORTANT: All field values MUST include a locale key (e.g., 'en-US') for each value, like: { title: { 'en-US': 'My Updated Title' } }. Every field in Contentful requires a locale even for single-language content.

fields.description: The fields to update with localized values. Example: { title: { 'en-US': 'My Updated Title' } }

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_publish_entry
description: Publish an entry or multiple entries. Accepts either a single entryId (string) or an array of entryIds (up to 100 entries). For a single entry, it uses the standard publish operation. For multiple entries, it automatically uses bulk publishing.

oneOf.description: Array of entry IDs to publish (max: 100)

entryId.description: ID of the entry to publish, or an array of entry IDs (max: 100)

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_unpublish_entry
description: Unpublish an entry or multiple entries. Accepts either a single entryId (string) or an array of entryIds (up to 100 entries). For a single entry, it uses the standard unpublish operation. For multiple entries, it automatically uses bulk unpublishing.

oneOf.description: Array of entry IDs to unpublish (max: 100)

entryId.description: ID of the entry to unpublish, or an array of entry IDs (max: 100)

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_list_assets
description: List assets in a space. Returns a maximum of 3 items per request. Use skip parameter to paginate through results.

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return (max: 3)

skip.description: Number of items to skip for pagination

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_list_content_types
description: List content types in a space. Returns a maximum of 10 items per request. Use skip parameter to paginate through results.

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return (max: 3)

skip.description: Number of items to skip for pagination

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_get_content_type
description: Get details of a specific content type

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

fields.description: Array of field definitions for the content type

type.description: Type of the field (Text, Number, Date, Location, Media, Boolean, JSON, Link, Array, etc)

localized.description: Whether this field can be localized

linkType.description: Required for Link fields. Specifies what type of resource this field links to

items.description: Required for Array fields. Specifies the type of items in the array

validations.description: Array of validation rules for the field

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_update_content_type
description: Update an existing content type. The handler will merge your field updates with existing content type data, so you only need to provide the fields and properties you want to change.

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_list_environments
description: List all environments in a space

entryIds.description: Array of entry IDs to validate

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_list_ai_actions
description: List all AI Actions in a space

limit.description: Maximum number of AI Actions to return

skip.description: Number of AI Actions to skip for pagination

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_get_ai_action
description: Get a specific AI Action by ID

aiActionId.description: The ID of the AI Action to retrieve

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name.description: The name of the AI Action

description.description: The description of the AI Action

instruction.description: The instruction object containing the template and variables

template.description: The prompt template with variable placeholders

conditions.description: Optional array of conditions for the template

modelType.description: The type of model to use (e.g., gpt-4)

modelTemperature.description: The temperature setting for the model (0.0 to 1.0)

testCases.description: Optional array of test cases for the AI Action

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

aiActionId.description: The ID of the AI Action to update

name.description: The name of the AI Action

description.description: The description of the AI Action

instruction.description: The instruction object containing the template and variables

template.description: The prompt template with variable placeholders

conditions.description: Optional array of conditions for the template

modelType.description: The type of model to use (e.g., gpt-4)

modelTemperature.description: The temperature setting for the model (0.0 to 1.0)

testCases.description: Optional array of test cases for the AI Action

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

aiActionId.description: The ID of the AI Action to delete

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

aiActionId.description: The ID of the AI Action to publish

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

aiActionId.description: The ID of the AI Action to unpublish

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_invoke_ai_action
description: Invoke an AI Action with variables

aiActionId.description: The ID of the AI Action to invoke

variables.description: Key-value pairs of variable IDs and their values

rawVariables.description: Array of raw variable objects (for complex variable types like references)

outputFormat.description: The format of the output content

waitForCompletion.description: Whether to wait for the AI Action to complete before returning

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_get_ai_action_invocation
description: Get the result of a previous AI Action invocation

aiActionId.description: The ID of the AI Action

invocationId.description: The ID of the specific invocation to retrieve

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_get_comments
description: Retrieve comments for an entry with pagination support. Returns comments with their status and body content.

entryId.description: The unique identifier of the entry to get comments for

bodyFormat.description: Format for the comment body content

limit.description: Maximum number of comments to return (1-100, default: 10)

skip.description: Number of comments to skip for pagination (default: 0)

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_create_comment
description: Create a new comment on an entry. The comment will be created with the specified body and status. To create a threaded conversation (reply to an existing comment), provide the parent comment ID. This allows you to work around the 512-character limit by creating threaded replies.

entryId.description: The unique identifier of the entry to comment on

body.description: The content of the comment (max 512 characters)

parent.description: Optional ID of the parent comment to reply to. Use this to create threaded conversations or to continue longer messages by replying to your own comments.

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_get_single_comment
description: Retrieve a specific comment by its ID for an entry.

entryId.description: The unique identifier of the entry

commentId.description: The unique identifier of the comment to retrieve

bodyFormat.description: Format for the comment body content

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_delete_comment
description: Delete a specific comment from an entry.

entryId.description: The unique identifier of the entry

commentId.description: The unique identifier of the comment to delete

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master

name: contentful_update_comment
description: Update an existing comment on an entry. The handler will merge your updates with the existing comment data.

entryId.description: The unique identifier of the entry

commentId.description: The unique identifier of the comment to update

body.description: The updated content of the comment

status.description: The updated status of the comment

bodyFormat.description: Format for the comment body content

spaceId.description: The ID of the Contentful space. This must be the space's ID, not its name, ask for this ID if it's unclear.

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment within the space, by default this will be called Master
